name: Best Rock Albums - Top 100 Latest & Greatest New Record Music Charts & Hit Song Lists, Encyclopedia & Reviews
name_original: Best Rock Albums - Top 100 Latest & Greatest New Record Music Charts & Hit Song Lists, Encyclopedia & Reviews
description:
Best Rock Albums is the FREE app that gives you information on the Top 100 Rock albums currently dominating the charts. Features:

*** LATEST ROCK CHARTS downloaded
*** DETAILED ENCYCLOPEDIC ALBUM INFO for the Top 100 albums
*** LISTEN to the songs by linking to iTunes

Check out our other apps:
- Best Hip Hop & Rap Albums
- Best Pop Albums
- Best Music Albums
- Best Dance Albums
- Best Indie & Alternative Albums
- Best R&B & Soul Albums
- Best Electronic Albums
- Best Country Albums
- Best Reggae Albums
